meanings.sent1: Taking breaks during study sessions prolongs the learning process.
meanings.sent2: Using a bookmark prolongs the enjoyment of reading a good book.
meanings.sent3: Trying to avoid bedtime prolongs the inevitable.
meanings.sent4: His apology only prolongs the tension between them.
meanings.sent5: The suspenseful music prolongs the anticipation in the movie scene.

meanings.sent1: Regular exercise prolongs the benefits for your health.
meanings.sent2: Adding extra toppings prolongs the time it takes to make a pizza.
meanings.sent3: His insistence on telling jokes prolongs our lunch break.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected plot twist prolongs the excitement of the story.
meanings.sent5: The warm weather prolongs the blooming season for flowers.
